sql_db_url.description: full URL, including protocol and database, to the SQL db.

tests_tenants_service_password.description: For the tokens test suite, the password it should use for the tenants service (it requests tokens for the tenants service).

dev_default_access_token_ttl.description: The default TTL for access tokens in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_default_refresh_token_ttl.description: The default TTL for refresh tokens in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

use_allservices_password.description: When use_sk+True, determines whether Tokens API checks a single password ('allservices') for all services, or whether it checks passwords named for individual services. This property should be FALSE in prpoduction.
